title: gccgo: implementation of len(x) does not follow spec
body:
gccgo treats calls to built-in functions that result in a constant value not as function
calls for the purpose of http://tip.golang.org/ref/spec#Length_and_capacity .

For the details see the related issue #7385.

If gccgo is correct, the spec needs to be clarified. If the spec is correct, gccgo must
be fixed.
